text: Ani jara lokancya duracarabaddala allahane tyanna pakadita ghene suru kele asate tara dharativara eka dekhila jiva vacala nasata, parantu to tara tyanna eka nirdharita avadhiparyanta dhila (savada) deto, maga jevha tyanci ti vela yete tevha te eka ksana na mage rahu sakatata ani na pudhe ja'u sakatata
